metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2628 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: The DSGVO All in one for WP WordPress plugin before 4.2 does not sanitiseand escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege userssuch as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when theunfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

criterions.comment: wordpress package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
